# Burgers

Standard burger patties. Everything you can think of to try and stop them falling apart.

## Ingredients

* 500g beef mine
* 1 carrot
* 1 onion
* 1 tbsp tomato sauce
* 1 tbsp Worcertershire sauce
* 2 tsp soy sauce
* &frac12; cup breadcrumbs


## Method

Finely chop carrot and onion. Mix together all ingredients. Refrigerate if possible (not required). Shape into 6-8 patties, and pan fry for approximately 5 minutes per side or until cooked through.
